name: Svekmas: The Game
storyline: It's Svekmas again ! That time of year where Santa-Svekke delivers joy and happiness and helps the world to get into the real Holiday Spirit !
summary:
Svekmas: The Game

Get ready for a hilarious holiday adventure in Svekmas: The Game! This lighthearted and satirical game was created as a tribute to Svekmas, the annual Christmas event hosted by DikkeSvekke.

Take control of Santa’s sleigh and his trusty reindeer in a fast-paced, fun-filled challenge. With simple controls (spacebar or right mouse click), navigate your way through an endless winter wonderland. Dodge Christmas trees, stay alive as long as possible, and climb the community leaderboard to prove you’re the ultimate sleigh master!

Will you survive the chaotic festivities and reign supreme this Svekmas season?
